nodes.text: Ku-ki was a female Human who served as the fourteenth keeper of memories of the Outcasts following the death of Rukil, and the tribe's Promised One. She recorded at least one hologram about the fate of the Outcasts following their exodus to the Promised Land, which was discovered by a Republic-allied individual on Taris. She was eventually succeeded by Lurr.
Ku-ki was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011.
